attributes.action: Stop the discrimination of BNP party members by the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I do not support some of the BNP's views, I get fed up of the amount of discrimination BNP members receive from the the government. It is banned for them to join the police or prison service. Surely a better way to tackle police racism would be to fire anyone actually being racist, not banning them because their BNP. What happened to freedom of belief, and political freedom?
